title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 §§ 251-1.7 - Admission to special housing units
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 §§ 251-1.7 - Admission to special housing units

State Regulations

Admission of an incarcerated individual to a special housing
unit shall be in accord with Part 301 of this Title. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7
§§
251-1.7

Amended

New

York State Register May 10, 2023/Volume XLV, Issue 19, eff. 5/10/2023

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
